fields.name: Swirlie:
fields.value: Use in conjunction with the Factional Attack. If your target is a Mage-aligned player, your attack power will be increased to 1.6x, and you will rampage attack.

fields.name: Wedgie:
fields.value: Use in conjunction with the Factional Attack. If your target is a Town Investigative player, your attack power will be increased to 1.2x, and you will attack astrally.

fields.name: Butt Kick (Passive):
fields.value: If your target survives your attack, then the following night, their defense power will be cut in half and you will gain roleblock immunity.

fields.name: Inferiority Complex (Passive):
fields.value: This role cannot spawn unless at least one Mage-aligned player is present or will be present.

fields.name: Somehow Popular Despite Being Devoid Of Personality (Passive):
fields.value: You may request three Hello Neighbors each day phase.
